m_szDocSumamry: Steven Chu Resigns as U.S. Energy Secretary Feb. 1, 2013 , 1:50 PM Resigning. Energy Secretary Steven Chu, shown here at 2012 congressional hearing, has announced plans to step down. U.S. House of Representatives Committee on Science, Space and Technology Energy Secretary Steven Chu announced today he will leave his post once President Barack Obama names a successor. "I would like to return to an academic     life of teaching and research," Chu wrote in a lengthy letter to employees at the Department of Energy (DOE), adding that he will stay on the job at least     through the end of this mont
